fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Wolf's Gravestone__ 
General best weapon, needs high investment into CRIT DMG and CRIT Rate

__Serpent Spine__
Outweighs Wolf's Gravestone if running an Attack buffer such as Bennett or Kujou Sara

__Akuoumaru__
A weapon-banner only 4-star weapon increasing in value as the team's Energy costs increase.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Redhorn Stonethresher, The Unforged, Akuoumaru, Skyward Pride, Sacrificial Greatsword, Beacon of the Reed Sea, Fang of the Mountain King, A Thousand Blazing Suns, Verdict__
5-star stat sticks. They do not particularly synergize well with Beidou, but provide valuable stats.

__"Ultimate Overlord's Mega Magic Sword", Akuoumaru, Katsuragikiri Nagamasa, Luxurious Sea-Lord, Talking Stick, Forest Regalia__
Stat-sticks that work when their passive can be triggered. Although some event weapons are very good, they are not currently avaliable.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
The Energy Recharge needed will be anywhere between 100% to 180% based on what battery you are running or if you are running no battery at all. The 51.8% of Energy Recharge Sands is unnecessary when running a battery. Due to the Electro Resonance, it places her energy requirements between 120% to 140%, and if running the Emblem of Severed Fate set, the amount needed from substats is 0% to 20%.
The Electro Traveler lowers her energy requirements to 100%, and as her Energy Recharge transfer does not work with the Emblem of Severed Fate set, it is not recommended to run this set. The 2-piece Thundering Fury, 2-piece Noblesse Oblige or 2-piece Attack set will be better.
